prompt:
Nurse: I'm here to help. Have you arranged for a ride home and for someone to stay with you after the procedure?

Patient: Yes.

Nurse: That's great to hear. It's essential to have someone to assist you as you recover. If there's anything else you need to discuss or any other questions you have, feel free to ask.

Patient: Okay.

Nurse: Alright, I believe we've covered all the necessary topics for today. Before we wrap up, do you have any other questions or concerns?

Patient: Nope.

Nurse: Alright, I'm glad we could address all your concerns today. To summarize, before your procedure, remember to use the chlorhexidine scrub the night before and the morning of your procedure. Don't eat or drink anything after midnight before your procedure. After your procedure, you'll need to follow your doctor's instructions and participate in physical therapy to help manage your pain and improve your recovery. Can I count on you to do all of this?

Patient: Yes.

responses.gpt4: Fantastic, that's what I like to hear. Remember, I'm here for you every step of the way. If you have any more questions before or after your procedure, don't hesitate to call me back at 641-381-6523.
responses.our_model: That's wonderful to hear. Remember, I'm here for you every step of the way. If you have any questions at any time, you can call me back at 641-381-6523. I want to thank you for your time today and for your commitment to your recovery. I'm looking forward to hearing about your walks around the neighborhood once you've recovered. Take care and have a great day. Goodbye for now.
